title: Cauliflower, black pea, hummus, cured ham and a smoked onion sauce
description: Black peas are an unusual, but traditional British ingredient also known as black badger beans, maple peas, carin peas or carling peas. Try them here as a hummus.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a smoker, a steamer, a deep-fat fryer and a food processor.
ingredients: 250g/9oz dried black badger peas (also known as maple peas and carin peas)
50ml/2fl oz sunflower oil, plus extra for roasting the garlic
salt and freshly ground black pepper
